text: is a former member of the Japanese idol girl group NMB48. She is a member of NMB48's Team N. == Biography == Tanigawa passed NMB48's 2nd generation auditions in May 2011. Her audition song was "Kiseki" by GReeeeN.http://ameblo.jp/nmb48/entry-10965457171.html Her debut was on June 5, 2011. Her stage debut was on August 13, 2011.http://www.asahi.com/showbiz/music/OSK201108130133.html In January 2012, she was selected to join Team M.http://ameblo.jp/nmb48/entry-11147080740.html Tanigawa's first NMB48 senbatsu was for the single Nagiichi.http://ameblo.jp/nmb48/entry-11208648124.html Tanigawa did jazz dance for 7 years."B.L.T" October 2011 Her dream is to be a multi-talent. On November 2, 2019, Tanigawa announced that she will graduate from the group during NMB48's performance. she graduated from the group on December 25, 2019. ==Discography== ===NMB48 singles=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
